# <span style="color: red;">`r marb`</span>

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width="25%", out.height="20%", fig.cap=" ", fig.show='hold', fig.align='center', result = 'asis'}

} else {
  knitr::include_graphics(c(sel_fig1, sel_fig2, sel_fig3, sel_fig4))
}

```
